en_text: As I peek into your fathomless eyes,  I lose my composure
jp_text: 君の瞳の深さを覗き見て狼狽える
google_translated: See you the depth of your eyes

en_text: Is there any hope  in the place I am heading to?
jp_text: 望みなどあったでしょうか　この行き先には
google_translated: Is there any hope?

en_text: I feign amusement and laugh
jp_text: 戯けて笑うのは
google_translated: A smiling and laughing

en_text: because this road is so dark
jp_text: この道が暗いから
google_translated: Because this road is dark

en_text: I will be there to shine the light
jp_text: 灯りを灯すのに　僕がいるでしょう
google_translated: I will be on lighting

en_text: but I cried when I waved to you
jp_text: でも手を振ったら泣いちゃった
google_translated: But when I wanded my hand, I cried

en_text: Our fiery woes fade... and fade...  until night falls upon us
jp_text: 僕らの真っ赤な悲しみが 暮れる 暮れる そして夜が来る
google_translated: Our bright red sadness has a sleep and night comes

en_text: If I knew tomorrow would be so mundane,
jp_text: 当たり前にやってくる明日なら

en_text: I wouldn't have said that I wanted to live
jp_text: 生きたいなんて言わなかった

en_text: I know it's futile but can't help dreaming  of a future... a future... you are to blame
jp_text: よせばいいのに夢見てしまう 未来 未来 君のせいなんだ
